name: Portal Rush
summary: Portal Rush is an exhilarating VR runner game that challenges you to navigate obstacle-filled courses at high speed. As you dash through the levels, you can instantly teleport to different locations by opening portals where you click. This dynamic game tests your reflexes and pushes you to conquer increasingly difficult tracks. Your goal is to reach the finish line as quickly as possible and achieve high scores. With its unique portal mechanic, this game brings a fresh twist to classic runner
